welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Heredia, a charming city known for its rich history and breathtaking natural beauty. Get ready to immerse yourself in its vibrant culture, delicious food, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and don't hesitate to explore all that Heredia has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and charter flights at Tobias Bolaños International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights within Costa Rica.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
